scripts.installglobals: npm i -g bower gulp cordova ionic tsd@next karma-cli protractor node-gyp coffee-script js-beautify typescript npm-check parse-dashboard mongodb-runner playup
scripts.deploy-qa: cp app-qa.yaml app.yaml && gcloud preview app deploy --stop-previous-version --project QA_PROJECT_ID
scripts.deploy-prod: cp app-prod.yaml app.yaml && gcloud preview app deploy --stop-previous-version --project PROD_PROJECT_ID
